description: Aereo, a company that allows users to watch live TV online, may be coming soon to a city near you. But it's also facing major legal challenges from some of broadcast's biggest players.
title: Online TV provider Aereo expanding despite broadcast lawsuits
teaser: Aereo, a company that allows users to watch live TV online, may be coming soon to a city near you. But it's also facing major legal challenges from some of broadcast's biggest players.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, July 1, 2013
contentencoded:
Aereo, which allows users to watch live TV online, is available in Boston, New York, and recently announced an expansion to Chicago, Atlanta and a host of other cities. But the company is also being sued by broadcasters for what they claim is unauthorized streaming.

CEO Chet Kanojia joins Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson to discuss the company and its future.
